categories.name: Selected Projects
categories.description: A selection of engineering and research projects focusing on fixed-income pricing, model risk, and tail-risk analysis. Each project contains a short description and tech stack.

projects.title: SOFR/OIS Interest-Rate Swap Pricer
projects.description:
Python engine for curve bootstrapping and swap risk analytics. I built a pricing engine that bootstraps SOFR/OIS discount and forward curves from deposit, futures, and swap quotes, with both linear and cubic-spline interpolation options. On top of the curve framework, I implemented risk analytics (NPV, DV01, convexity) under parallel and key-rate shocks, roll-down analysis, and exposures.

Tech stack: Python, NumPy, pandas, curve bootstrapping, interpolation, DV01/convexity analytics

projects.title: MBS OAS & Prepayment Analytics
projects.description:
Option-Adjusted Spread engine for mortgage-backed securities. Built an OAS engine using binomial trees and Monte Carlo, modelled prepayments (CPR/SMM/PSA) with drivers like rate incentives, burnout, and seasonality, and calibrated short-rate models (Hull-White / CIR) to swaption data to generate rate paths for valuation and hedge recommendations.

Tech stack: Python, Monte Carlo, binomial trees, short-rate modelling, prepayment modelling

projects.title: Portfolio Tail Risk — VaR & Expected Shortfall
projects.description:
Monte Carlo + EVT for 99.9% ES and capital planning. Modeled tail risk using 10,000 Monte Carlo paths with EVT tails (GPD) to estimate 99.9% ES for multi-year corporate cash flows; built scenario and liquidity stress frameworks and a capital-planning approach.

Tech stack: Python, Monte Carlo simulation, EVT (GPD tails), scenario analysis, ES/VaR

projects.title: Stochastic Interest-Rate & Volatility Modelling
projects.description:
Calibrating Vasicek, CIR, and Hull-White to market data for short-rate modelling. Used MLE-style calibration to market instruments (bonds, swaptions, caps/floors) and produced forward-looking volatility paths and surfaces for risk quantification and hedging.

Tech stack: Python, term-structure modelling, MLE calibration, volatility surface analysis

projects.title: Model Risk Management — SR 11-7 Validation Report
projects.description:
Turning model risk guidance into practical controls. Developed a model risk management framework aligned with SR 11-7, including inventory and tiering, conceptual soundness checks, implementation verification, outcomes analysis, and monitoring thresholds. Produced a validation report and presentation for a graduate seminar.

Tech stack: Model risk, governance, documentation, validation

projects.title: Real-Time Trading Dashboards at String Metaverse
projects.description:
Intraday P&L, Greeks, and factor-model research for digital assets. Built Python-based dashboards streaming real-time order-book and exposure data, validated derivatives P&L and Greeks for multi-token positions, and implemented factor-model pipelines and reproducible Git-based workflows.

Tech stack: Python, pandas/NumPy, derivatives P&L/Greeks, real-time data
